moves.1. e4: An exhibition game played with a 2000 player at a tournament i went to
moves.1... e6: Standard French defense in my three minute blitz game?  No thank you sir.
moves.2. c4 d5 3. cxd5 exd5 4. Qb3: I hope for the pawn sac in order for an attack on f7
moves.7. d3: !  exd3 causes a discovered check and where does white king have to go?
moves.8... Nbd7 9. Bg5: Here white's master plan comes into play.
moves.9... Nc5: Black attempts to break up the mini battery here
moves.11. Re1 Nfe4: Worse is Nce4.  12. Bxf6 Qxf6 13. Rxe4   or  12. Bxf6 Bxa3 13. Bxe5 and attack on both the knight and bishop while already managing to be a piece up
moves.12. Nf3: protecting the bishop and attacking the queen
moves.12... Qf5 13. Bxd3: pinning the knight to the queen and the winning of a piece
moves.13... Nxd3: black assumes this is a blunder

gameName: Blitz variations that lead to defeat
